content.title: UI for Edit Recipients Screen
content.body:
1. From the bottom-left corner of Iris, navigate to the Default Library.
  2. Next to the Default Library, you will see the My Libraries tab and a search icon. Click the search icon.
  3. In the search bar that appears, enter EditRecipient.
  4. From the results, under RecipientsMobile, select EditRecipient.
  5. Drag the EditRecipient collection onto the frmEditRecipient on the canvas.
